+ * limitations under the License.

+
+package org.apache.spark.launcher
+
+/**
+ * This class makes SparkSubmitOptionParser visible for Spark code outside of the `launcher`
+ * package.
+ */
+private[spark] abstract class SparkSubmitArgumentsParser extends SparkSubmitOptionParser {
+
+}

comments.body: should we add a note on why we need to do this, i.e. java doesn't have the equivalent notion of `private[spark]` here and we want to avoid exposing this class as a public API.
